definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: In the Forbes.com survey conducted by E-Poll Market Research Co.
sentences.chinese: 該調查由福布斯網站授權進行。

sentences.english: The full list can be seen at www.forbes.com.
sentences.chinese: 完整榜單登載在福布斯網站上。

sentences.english: Forbes' rankings are skewed toward counties with good school districts.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯的排名傾向於那些具有好學區的郡縣。

sentences.english: The full list can be seen at www.forbes.com。
sentences.chinese: 完整榜單登載在福布斯網站上。

sentences.english: The Forbes family remains the controlling shareholder of Forbes Media.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯家族仍然是福布斯傳媒公司的控股方。

sentences.english: The Forbes family remains the controlling shareholder of Forbes Media.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯家族仍然是福布斯傳媒公司的控股方。

sentences.english: This year’s Celebrity 100 was themed around celebrity entrepreneurs.
sentences.chinese: 今年福布斯全球100名人榜的主旋律是名人企業家。

sentences.english: By 2001, they had made their way onto the Forbes rich list.
sentences.chinese: 到2001年，他們已經躋身福布斯財富榜。

sentences.english: Forbes Magazine, for example, is for people who hope to make more money.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯雜誌是爲了那些希望賺大錢的人而設的。

sentences.english: “Now the Forbes list has become the wanted list, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “現在福布斯富豪榜已經成了通緝犯名單，”他說。

sentences.english: The Forbes article is a semi-classic "denial" piece.
sentences.chinese: 這篇《福布斯》文章是半經典“否定”式的。

sentences.english: Forbes met the stipulated financial targets.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯傳媒也滿足了放款方規定的財務指標。

sentences.english: Forbes recently listed her as the world's 43rd most influential woman.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯最近將其列爲世界第43位最有影響力的女性。

sentences.english: This is Forbes' third go-round this year at putting Winfrey at the top of some list or other.
sentences.chinese: 這是奧普拉今年第三次蟬聯福布斯排行榜冠軍。

sentences.english: Fobes ended up in prison for not paying his taxes.
sentences.chinese: 福布斯因爲沒有納稅而最終入獄。

definition: ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100
New York Times, abbr. for 紐約時報|纽约时报[Niu3 Yue1 Shi2 bao4]
Warren Buffett (1930-), the Sage of Omaha, US investor and philanthropist, principal owner of holding company Berkshire Hathaway
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
